description:
A mysterious madman from Eu’s past terrorizes her new friends. Will the necromancer give in to his demands, or will she stubbornly watch Ayumu and the others meet their untimely ends?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ja, wenn ich strippe, wirst du staunen!
Sim, Você Não Vai Acreditar No Que Está Por Baixo Disso!
Tak, nie uwierzysz co się za tym kryje
Yes, When I Strip Down, You`ll Be Amazed
はい, 脱ぐと凄いんです
